cast.overview: It's 1943 and World War II is raging in Europe. In New York, Arturo and Flora the daughter of a restaurant owner are in love, but she is promised in marriage to the son of a Mafia boss. There is a way around this, but to be able to marry Flora, Arturo needs to get permission from her father, who lives in a village in Sicily. Arturo doesn't have any money, so the only way he can get to Sicily is to enlist in the U.S. Army, which is preparing for a landing on the island.
cast.title: At War for Love

details.biography: Aldo Rapé attended the COMICLAB Academy of Comedy, then workshops with teachers  of the "Silvio D'Amico" National Academy of Dramatic Art in Rome. He trains through a two-year acting workshop, "THE BAGAGLIO DELL'ATTORE" deepening studies on Commedia dell'arte and theatrical improvisation as well as approaching a new theatrical method, called the "Alschitz method." Cabaret performer, street artist, attending numerous training stages deepening and experimenting with the figure of the clown. He won numerous national and international awards, including the prize for best foreign show at the 2012 Avignon Off Festival (MUTU).
details.name: Aldo Rapé
